commitResults.messageTitle: Store text and return when requested
commitResults.messageBody:
Store user texts in a String array of fixed size of 100.
When user command "list", print the texts.

commitResults.messageTitle: Store user text and list out when commanded
commitResults.messageBody:
Store text in a String array of a fixed size of 100.
When user commands "list", iterate through the array to print out the
stored texts.

Added marked/unmarked boxes beside list
Abstraction of codes within chat to individual functions

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mark and unmark tasks functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Added checkbox beside list to show whether is it marked
Abstraction of code in main to individual functions

commitResults.messageTitle: Wrap line to keep length shorter than 120chars

commitResults.messageBody:
Remove happy path nesting
Wrap lines for print statements
Removes complex expressions

Added todo, deadline and event command on top of list, mark and bye,
otherwise it will print invalid command

commitResults.messageTitle: Change enum to individual classes for task type
commitResults.messageBody:
Separate date from description
Overriden toString method to have a more meanngful string representation
of task

Added input and expected testcases
Modified file path for runtest.bat

Used switch statements and String.split method for clearer flow
Separated mark and unmark functions

commitResults.messageTitle: Accept more than two date parts
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed the limit for 3 text parts (or 2 date parts)
Used loops instead of switch to deal with the change more efficiently

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify code after reviewing peer reviews
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed redundant try catch in addTask
Merged mark and unmark task to one function in both Task and Iris

Moved invalid command check from addTask to default in chat
Replace all error message with one that is more specific and has more
characteristics

commitResults.messageTitle: Add test cases and modify expected output
Add exceptions class specific to Iris

commitResults.messageBody: Split into exceptions, method and task packages for better readability
